Venue: Finding a suitable venue that can accommodate the number of guests and is safe for children.
Invitations: Designing and distributing invitations that are visually appealing and include all necessary details.
Entertainment: Planning and booking entertainment that is age-appropriate and engaging for the child and their guests.
Food and drinks: Planning a menu that is appealing to children and catering to any dietary restrictions or allergies.
Activities: Organizing age-appropriate activities that are safe and enjoyable for the child and their guests.
